definition: to attack someone by innuendo (idiom)/to make oblique charges/to make insinuations/to insinuate

sentences.english: In this paper, a linear camera self-calibration technique based on projective reconstruction is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于射影重建的线性摄像机自标定方法。

sentences.english: The synthetic geometers were developing projective geometry .
sentences.chinese: 综合几何学家们在发展射影几何学。

sentences.english: What's this innuendo comment about "- loyal soldiers -"?
sentences.chinese: 你那句含沙射影的说“忠诚的战士”是什么意思？

sentences.english: The invention discloses a light projection speed-per-hour digital display device;
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种灯光射影时速数字显示装置。

sentences.english: He is always blackening others' character by insinuation.
sentences.chinese: 他总是含沙射影地贬低别人的人格。

sentences.english: As photograph can be considered as central projection, photogrammetry is naturally a topic of projective geometry.
sentences.chinese: 摄影测量天然地就是一个射影几何问题。

sentences.english: He resented the insinuation that he was too old for the job.
sentences.chinese: 他憎恶别人含沙射影，说他太老不适合那工作。

sentences.english: This essay in concerned with two dimension of complex projection space.
sentences.chinese: 文章以二维复射影空间为论域。

sentences.english: They make false insinuations against the Apostle.
sentences.chinese: 他们作出虚假含沙射影对使徒。

sentences.english: A derivatization of Q is equipollent with Q, i. e. , they define isomorphic projective planes.
sentences.chinese: 的衍生与Q等效，即它们定义的射影平面是同构的。

sentences.english: It is the plane through the center of projection parallel to the image plane.
sentences.chinese: 它是过射影中心且平行于象平面的平面。

sentences.english: In this paper we discuss the algebraic expression of involutory perspective in three-dimensional projective space.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了三维射影空间上对合透视的代数表达式。
